review_blob: Pours a medium orange with a thin head on tap at hop leaf. Aroma is dank hops for sure. Flavor is sweet and hits nicely yum. Strong for sure but tasty! Sweet hoppy goodness! This is like drinking hop nectar. Dry bitter finish is a bit off-puting.

Clearish pretty clear yellow with a thin head at a place providing bad pours. Light aroma, watery maybe a little grape. Flavor follows as this is like air. I would think maybe "American Belgian White" would be a good deScription. Warning: my taste buds were just blown out by unusually spicy nacho cheese sauce and jalapeos on my burger.
Slightly cloudy yellow with good head when properly agitated. Restaurant! Hidden tangerine finish behind a nice aroma. Sweet hops I assume jade. Never had jade before but yum!

Pours a beautiful light orange gold with lots of bubbles and a good head. Aroma does not disappoint with its pineapple hops. Flavor is also pineapple but it hits hardest in the finish. Good ale here from a good line of IPAs.

Pours a cloudy apricot on tap at the tap room. Sweet hop aroma and I mean very. Very hoppy in the mouth too. Kinda champagne-y but a dusty dry hop texture like Zombie Dust. Wow a direct compare to one of the greatest beers ever. Still, its pretty acidic.
UPDATED: DEC 15, 2015

Slightly hazy yellow with little head on tap in Islamorada. 
Sweet alcohol grape aroma, sour flavor. Decent.
Sweet aroMa cleaR yellow no head on tap at beer garden. Lots of sweet mango. Refreshing and surprisingly enjoyable but all mango and no beer. Welcome to rate mango juice dot com.
Amber color with no head on tap at the beer garden. Sour foot aroma. Flavor is better but slightly roasted. Too dark for me.
Really light golden blonde ale with no head at Marker 88 on tap. Clear yellow: sour a bit, and kinda lagery in flavor. Come to expect from golden blondes. Bit of citrus flavor too, perhaps lemon.
As someone who doesnt drink a lot of ambers, this is good. Looks good, smells good, tastes good. Seems like a great textbook amber.
beer_name: Florida Beer Key West Sunset Ale

review_blob: Pours a clear yellow with huge head from a bottle. Sweet hefe alco-aroma. Flavor is banana liquor. Decent.
Pretty solid citrus IPA from a decent brewery. Citrus is omnipresent, and its almost a bit too much. Not too bad though and is quite "sessionable."

Oh yeah pleasantly surprised with this one! Great aroma of sweet hops is this an IPA? Yes, it sure is! Low ABV is welcome with so much flavor. Drank on tap at the Map Room, and will seek out in the stores!
Aroma is a sweet alcohol citrus in a golden pour with a thickish head. Good flavor and not sour plus some hoppy goodness.
beer_name: Three Floyds / Gigantic Crescendo of Doom

review_blob: Im not happy with this one at all. I dont like the flavor or the aroma or the look of it, or really anything. It has the general palate of Modus Hoperondi, and theres a mandarin flavor in there. So I would say this beer is completely as-advertised. Im not a fan, though.

The aroma is very neutral. It doesnt distract you from drinking a lot of them. Its like angels came down from the heavens and designed something and put it on a can, and the beer itself looks good. I mean, I can drink a lot of them. What else do you need to know about taste? Its smooth. Its watery. And dont forget it gets ya fucked up. You or whatever. Overall, try to find a better beer. - Guest review by "Blatz".
Mild lager, clear yellow with lots of bubbles and good head. Decent mild flavor. Not too bad. Hang fiddy. Aroma sour lager. What else i got to say?
UPDATED: NOV 26, 2015
Pours a clear golden orange with a decent head. Sweet aroma of alcohol and hops. Flavor has a bit of roasting and a dry finish.
Pours a clear golden color with a decent head. Aroma is pretty mild but flavor has some sweetiesz.
Pours a clear golden color with a slight alcohol aroma. Flavor is a bit sour and hops. Not too shabby.

Very sweet apricot aroma. Pours a medium orange brown, slightly hazy, lots of bubbles and good sustained head. Did not let Binnys let this get warm. I took the cold bottle from their shelf and brought it home. Really good flavor with some really sweet aftertaste. Hops and sweetness - oh boy. No wonder the salesman was surprised they had some in stock. It was fresh off the truck, and boy is it delicious.

Pours an amber Orange on tap at lady Gregorys. Head is thick and creamy, aroma is a bit sweet with Apple. Flavor follows slightly but more earthy with a bit of roasting but it compliments the flavor well.

Pours a clear yellow at Lady Gregorys, which by the way is an awesome establishment in Chicago. Aroma is water and alcohol. Flavor is sour for sure. Grapes. Not a fan, asked for a different beer. Comped.
Clear Brown on tap at bad apple. Aroma is sweet hoppy citrus hops. Flavor is light sweet hoppy delicious. Oh dear we got a good one.

Sweet hop alcohol aroma. Pours a clear apricot-orange with a well-sized white head. Nice bubbles all around with a good aroma. A little sweet grape. Flavor is alcohol like a belgian out of the gate in the back of your throat. A little bit of sting-ing rain. Battery acid. Mnmnmnmnmn.
beer_name: Three Floyds Space Station Middle Finger

review_blob: Pours a dark amber with a thick bubbly head from a tall boy can. Fits well in an imperial pint. Aroma is distinctly hoppy with only slight roasting flavor. Flavor is some roasty roast. Roasted roasted hops, roasted roastedly on a roaster. Who would ruin a beer like this?
Oh my god this is the worst beer that I have ever had. It tastes like ass that has been marinating in the blood of hundreds of orphaned children from Somalia.

Pours a cloudy apricot with a well-sized white head. Aroma is sweet, hoppy, and delicious. Flavor is also very hoppy and well-balanced. This is very good flavor - very smooth and very nice. Good pick-up if youre in the Madison WI area.

Pours a clearish dark orange with a thickish white head. Nose is a bit sour and mild. Mouthfeel is good and flavor leaves a hoppy sweetness through the back of the mouth. Good flavor and nice way to sample some Galaxy hops. Love the galaxy hops, and you can taste their deliciousness here.
Sweet nice aroma pours a thinnish off white head is OK. Flavor of maybe a belgian actually, really nice. Would recommend.
Pretty good for a pils. Aroma is light, and flavor is flavity flav.. Pretty decent for a pils, but you know, Im a bit in the bag.
Pours a clear yellow with a thinnish head. Sweet delicious aroma. Nice mouth feel and flavor. Hops are light a bit bitter and yummy. Aftertaste is bitter too quite an adventure.
beer_name: Surly Overrated West Coast Style IPA

review_blob: On tap at L Woods in Lincolnwood. Aroma is very fruity, apples and pears. Clear light orange with a healthy head. Flavor is fruity alcohol. Reminds me of a champagne or white wine.
Very sweet floral aroma. Thick head, clear orange-yellow. Taste is nothing, then alcohol, then malts.
beer_name: Spiteful Cant Someone Else Do It?

review_blob: Pours a clearish orange with a thin to no head. Aroma is a bit sweet, alcohol hops. Flavor is a bit bitter with a sweet finish.

Yours a clear light orange with a thick bublly head. Aroma is sweet alcohol with a touch of grapes and apple. Flavor is creamy, delicious, sweet alcoholic apples and grapes. Theres a bit of a winey alcohol flavor, maybe the grapes.

Smells like an alcoholic ran over my cat. Tastes more like a tripel. Not really that bad overall. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Pours a darkish brown olive red clear from a bomber. Little toasty in the aroma, whoa the flavor. Reminds me more of zombie dust or pillar of salt. The toasty aroma is not present in the flavor at all, maybe a bit of a finish, but it is well-masked.

Drank the first pint thinking I was drinking sumpin sumpin.  No alarms went off, so thats pretty impressive.  Or thats how long since I had a sumpin.  Clear amber with a thinnish head on tap at Howard street.  Slightly roasted aroma and flavor.  Now this beer is annoying me.  Good head.  Sweet aroma, slightly fruity.  Flavor more complex and a bit hoppy.  Good, very good.  Bit of a sour finish.  Apple flavor hints.
Pours a cloudy brown with a roasted nose. Flavor follows bit is fairly mild. No thanks.
Pours a cloudy olive amber with a decent head. Nose is slightly sweet, a bit alcohol. Flavor is sweet fruity and awesome. Pretty good.
Smells and tastes a little off. Cant get past it rancid. What is that flavor? Who cares, bye! The bottle calls it dankness and grapefruit. Yup, about right. Bye!
Sweet hop aroma, almost honey. Flavor is also sweet hops. Decent, but not really a long term enjoyment.
Cloudy amber thick brown head. Dry hoppy water aroma. Flavor watery hoppy beer.
Pours a light tan with a little head. Aroma is sweet and so is flavor. Nice too.
Light gold with small head. Aroma light a bit sour. Flavor light and watery. Decent.
Pours slightly foggy olive amber from a bomber. Nice sweet hop aroma. Good flavor nice hops.
Pours clear orangish with a decent head. Aroma slightly sweet citrus. Flavor is a bit spicy and hoppy.
beer_name: Lagunitas A Little Sumpin Extra! Ale
